alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 10:47PM CST until January 20 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches with locally higher amounts over ridgetops and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
